item.title: This under-the-radar autonomous driving play can rally 65%, says Morgan Stanley
item.description: Morgan Stanley highlighted Aurora as the clear leader in the autonomous trucking space.

item.title: This RV maker gets an upgrade from Bank of America, which sees more than 25% upside ahead
item.description: Analyst Alexander Perry sees Thor Industries rebounding this year as the Airstream maker expands its customer base and increases shipments.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Apple, Nvidia, Tesla, Chipotle, Deere, Wingstop, Anheuser-Busch InBev & more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades Chipotle, sees a stock rebound after a rough start to 2025
item.description: Analyst Brian Harbour upgraded the burrito chain to overweight and upped his price target on the stock to $70, which suggests 29.7% potential upside.

item.title: Morgan Stanley's Jonas names struggling Tesla a top pick, sees nearly 50% comeback
item.description: Analyst Adam Jonas has an overweight rating on the stock, and his $430 price target implies about 46.8% potential upside for Tesla shares.
